title: Convert Fahrenheit to Celsius
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert fahrenheit to celsius

celcius = (fahrenheit - 32) * 5/9

Input ( F )  : -40
Output ( C ) : -40
markdown:
## Write a program to convert fahrenheit to celsius

celcius = (fahrenheit - 32) * 5/9

```
Input ( F )  : -40
Output ( C ) : -40
```
